description.lang: Harmony Home Hub ExtenderControl Z-Wave and other devices with your Harmony Home Hub.Extending compatibility of your Harmony Home Hub is simple.Attach Home Hub Extender to your Home Hub or Ultimate Hub via USB.Us the Harmony mobile app for iOS or Android to setup and add devices.Enjoy integrated control of Z-Wave and other smart home devices from brands like GE, Schlage, Yale, Kwikset, and more.Visit myharmony.com/compatibility for the the most up-to-date list of compatible devices.
